definition: PRC National Day (October 1st)
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo
to celebrate
festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: National Day is coming, and we can have a seven day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節來了，我有七天啲假期。

sentences.english: We celebrate our National Day every year.
sentences.chinese: 我們每年都要慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: It is a(public) holiday in the PRC to celebrate its national day.
sentences.chinese: 這是中國的一個慶祝國慶節的法定假期。

sentences.english: On the National Day holiday, thousands of people gather in the Square.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節的時候，大概有幾萬人堆集在廣場上。

sentences.english: The parterres will stay until the National Day on October 1.
sentences.chinese: 今年廣場花壇擺放將一直延續到國慶節後。

sentences.english: National Day is warmly celebrated on October 1 by the Chinese people of all nationalities every year.
sentences.chinese: 我國各族人民每年都要熱烈慶祝十月一日國慶節。

sentences.english: Our school will hold a big party this afternoon to celebrate National Day.
sentences.chinese: 學校今天下午舉辦一個大型晚會來慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: This year's National Day, I came home Chun.
sentences.chinese: 今年國慶節的時候，我來到了老家淳安。

sentences.english: National Day is commemorated every year by special flag-raising ceremonies.
sentences.chinese: 每一年的國慶節都是從特殊的升旗儀式開始慶祝的。

sentences.english: Today is the National Day. It is our country's birthday.
sentences.chinese: 今天是國慶節，這是我們祖國母親的生日。

sentences.english: With a joyful heart we observed our National Day.
sentences.chinese: 我們滿懷喜悅的心情慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: There will be a huge parade in celebration of National Day.
sentences.chinese: 將有一個盛大的遊行來慶祝國慶節。

sentences.english: National Day celebrations often include fireworks.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節慶典常包括放煙火。

sentences.english: This year's National Day I went to Beihai for travel with my friends.
sentences.chinese: 今年的國慶節我和我的朋友們去北海旅遊。

sentences.english: He must finish the work before National Day by all means.
sentences.chinese: 他無論如何必須在國慶節之前完成工作。

sentences.english: My friends and I went to the Fragrant Mount on National Day.
sentences.chinese: 國慶節那天，我和我的朋友們一起去香山遊玩。
